import React from "react"; import "./Contact.css"; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn, MDBIcon } from "mdbreact"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; const Contact = () => { function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "gmail", "template_5hnu26o", e.target, "user_CwNptdn7yDUpmXHZDgVci" ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); } ); e.target.reset(); } return (
